articles.title: ESA continues Hera launch preparations amid Falcon 9 grounding - SpaceNews
articles.description: The European Space Agency is proceeding with preparations for the launch of an asteroid mission on a SpaceX Falcon 9 even though the rocket remains grounded after an upper-stage anomaly on its most…
articles.content: WASHINGTON The European Space Agency is proceeding with preparations for the launch of an asteroid mission on a SpaceX Falcon 9 even though the rocket remains grounded after an upper-stage anomaly on… [+5033 chars]
